0.0.4.en: Added more product ID's to devices

0.0.6.en: Patch for Temp/Hum Sensor not updating (unit needs to be removed and paired again)

0.0.7.en: Added settings for Temp/Hum Sensor interval/change

0.0.12.en: Added 2 Gang Wall Switch and 3 Gang Wall Switch (white label)

0.0.20.en: Patch for ZBMini (and other wired devices) not reporting device offline. Adding ProdictId variants to Motion Sensor (SNZB-03).

0.0.22.en: Added Plug S26 and switch module ZBMini-L. Added reverse logic to door/window sensor.

0.0.23.en: Added SNZB-02D - temp/humidity sensor with LCD screen.
